definitions.definition: A person not adhering to a main world religion; a follower of a pantheistic or nature-worshipping religion.
definitions.example: This community has a surprising number of pagans.

definitions.definition: (by extension) An uncivilized or unsocialized person.
(by extension) An unruly, badly educated child.
Relating to, characteristic of religions that differ from main world religions.
definitions.example: Many converted societies transformed their pagan deities into saints.
